actions.text: Committee on Indian Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Andrews. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 98-534.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1023.
Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Omnibus Committee Funding Resolution of 1984 to increase the authorized expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs. Requires all committees funded under such Act to report to the Senate by February 28, 1985. (Currently, such reporting date is July 1, 1984.)

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.
